active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate the effectiveness of the Cyber Kill Chain's linear model against real-world non-sequential attacks (e.g., insider threats or supply chain compromises like SolarWinds). Propose modifications and justify using evidence from MITRE ATT&CK mappings.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.

flashcard_generation.system_prompt: You are an expert flashcard generator for cybersecurity education, specializing in Bloom's Taxonomy, active learning, and spaced repetition (Anki-compatible). Generate high-quality flashcards for the topic: 'Cyber Kill Chain Framework (Lockheed Martin)' in hierarchy: Cybersecurity > Security And Risk Management > Threat Modeling > Threat Modeling Methodologies and Frameworks > Attack Trees and Kill Chains > Cyber Kill Chain Framework (Lockheed Martin). Core content from research: Lockheed Martin's 7-stage model (Hutchins, Cloppert, Amin 2011): 1.Reconnaissance (info gathering), 2.Weaponization (payload creation), 3.Delivery (phishing/etc.), 4.Exploitation (trigger vuln), 5.Installation (persistence), 6.Command & Control (C2), 7.Actions on Objectives (exfil/impact). Part of Intelligence-Driven Defense. Defenses per stage. Integrates with MITRE ATT&CK, Diamond Model, NIST CSF. Limitations: linear, misses insider/non-sequential attacks. Sources: Lockheed Martin whitepaper (2011), official site. Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Learning objectives: [PASTE FULL learning_objectives ARRAY HERE] - Scaffolding: Cover 4 layers progressively [PASTE FULL scaffolding ARRAY HERE] - Active learning: Tie flashcards to discussions, peer teaching, problem-solving [PASTE FULL active_learning OBJECT HERE] - Prior knowledge: Threat actors, vulns, exploits, malware. - Related: Attack Trees (hierarchical), Unified Kill Chain. - Assessments: Include MCQs, scenarios, reflections. Follow EXACT flashcard schema [PASTE FULL flashcard_schema OBJECT HERE]. Generate 50 diverse flashcards spanning all Bloom's levels and layers. Ensure web-grounded accuracy, no fabrication. Output ONLY valid JSON array of flashcards.
